channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The footpath past the driveway is sunken, 14th February
item.description:
Footpath past the entrance to 50 Hatherley Road is Sunken evidence of past repairs , is worsening. Have seen people trip, all cars access img property catch underside on edge Issue present since at least 2020, but has worsened over the past few months - traps water and debris is a slip hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Hatherley Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole near drain, 13th February
item.description:
The drain is near Three Gables bungalow on Southcourt Drive. It is a large pothole that is getting bigger every day. Vehicles are not able to avoid driving into it due to cars that park on roadside opposite. Going to do damage to vehicles.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Southcourt Drive, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: How has this road not been sorted yet? It’s been like this for months this road is now dangerous I’ve be involved and witnessed accidents on this road where cars go onto the over side of the road to avoid all th potholes what are unavoidable and likely cause damage to our cars this road if needs to be needs temp lights re tarmac the one side of the road going away from the racecourse to Tommy Taylor’s, 13th February

item.title: Very large potholes, 13th February
item.description:
These have all been reported in the past there are too many to risk counting them it is dangerous as you loose control of your steering going down hill even at a very low speed difficult to see them in the dark! Danger to cyclists and motorcyclists you have to drive over the white line on other side of road to avoid them!!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Swindon Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
